betterquesting:10.desc:8:
[quest]Large Solar Boiler[/quest]

Machine Type: §aSolar Boiler§r

During the day and with clear weather, the boiler will heat up at a rate of §c0.1%§r per second. 

During the night and rain, the boiler will cool at a rate of §c0.01%§r per second.

[warn]Adding water to a dry boiler with a heat above 50% will cause it to explode![/warn]

The boiler needs a clear view of the sky in order to generate heat.

Two Tiers:

§3Bronze§r: §a4800L/s§r of Steam at full heat.
§3Steel§r: §a14400L/s§r of Steam at full heat.

After §c24§r hours, the boiler will begin to calcify.

Max calcification will occur after §c36§r hours, and steam output will be reduced to §a33.33%§r
 
Calcification can be reset using the button in the GUI, and can be prevented by using §9Distilled§r water.

§dQuest added by TheBigCheesish
